data.name: Micro world
data.short: The small world of electronics which only seemed to be small but had infinite boundaries when it came to fun and learning, such was the Micro World designed by Microbird.
data.description:
Have you ever thought of machines foretelling your future, counsel your personality, finding a ghost near you and maybe give a piece of love advice to you?
In many of actvitities of Culmyca 2019,Microbird announced its self-designed mini-world, MicroWorld: an abode for technology.

data.name: LUMOSTANZA
data.short:
Lumostanza was main event
of our club in CULMYCA'18.
We presneted a dance show
with effect of beautiful lights.
data.description:
Blend of Art and Technology is always fun, isn't it? We , Microbird-The Techno Clubalong with
SAMARPAN club presented star of the CULMYCA 2018 which was a dance show with 
performers wearing suits with amazing light effects.The suit was programmed in a way that light 
effects used to change with change in rhythm of music.We were able o gather a lot of audience
to watch the stage show which shows the success of the event.

data.name: Escalade 8.0
data.short: A chance to win prizes worth 80,000. A national event, the most awaited robotics championship was organised by Microbird -The Techno Club.
data.description:
Microbird, the Technical club felt immense proud by being the organiser of the most awaited robotics championship of the year, 2019 all over the country, ESCALADE 8.0.
Techniche, IIT Guwahati was back with the 8th version of ESCALADE and the zonal round was managed by Microbird.

data.name: TOCHOMOJI
data.short:
Emojis are part of our daily
life now so we made an 
intresting game using emotic-
ons and music in CULMYCA
2018.
data.description:
As the name suggests 'TochoMoji' means technology and emojis. We conducted a fun event 
on the ocassion of foundation day of our college.The event was consisted of many emoticons
and whenever an emoji was pressed a song related to the emoji was played. As we all know 
student's life is full of stress so along with technology there must be some fun too. This was
our motive to organize the event and everyone enjoyed a lot.

data.name: LASER PIANO
data.short:
Do you think playing Piano
without touching the keys is 
impossible? Well, we made
it possible in CULMYCA'18.
data.description:
LASER PIANO was part of our main events in CULMYCA 2018. Playing piano is really an art 
but what will you call yourself if you can do it without touching anything? We used laser lights
and LDR sensors to make it possible. Creativity don't have any limit and that's what we 
wanted to show by organizing such event

data.name: Pragyan
data.short: Pragyan - The technical competitive event of the club was back in which the participants were to make interesting and innovative projects alongwith detailed description of the same!
data.description: - Pragyan is the technical competitive event of the club in which students had to make a project related to electronics or electrical , a video of which was to be uploaded alongwith a short of the project. Basically the innovation and real life problem solving skills of the project were taken into account and the event proved to be a trailblazer for the new innovative minds out there!

data.name: HDL VERILOG Workshop
data.short:
We conducted a two days
online workshop on HDL
VERILOG which is used
to make digital circuits and 
need of modern industry.
data.description:
It was a two days session in which an external speaker was invited to teach everything about
HDL Verilog .VERILOG is the language used to design the digital circuits in electronics. From 
how to write first line of code, to design a real circuit each step was explained to students.
Certificates was given to all the participants.

data.name: Ex - Quiz -Me
data.short: Quizzes are amazing way to bring out the real knowledge from the students and test how spontaneously can they relate the concepts, so this quiz was organised by the club alongwith an opportunity to win amazing prizes!
data.description: This quiz organised by the club to add a pinch of knowledge in the boring lives amidst the lockdown was as interesting as its name ! The participants were required to have a Hackerearth account and was a multi level quiz which was a great success!

data.name: Advanced Circuits and PCB Designing
data.short: A session organised on a very auspicious day for the university which taught the participants about the Advanced circuits and PCB designing.
data.description: This extremely informative session was organised on 18 Sep 2020. It was held on a very special day of University's 51st Foundation Day.The session saw a huge participation from the audience eager to learn more about the same! The session enabled the attendees to dive deep into the ocean of the topic and explore more in the field!

data.name: Robotics with Arduino
data.short: Robotics and Arduino - both the topics which have set the modern techie world on fire were combined in the workshop to provide an amazing learning experience  to the students.
data.description: - This was a brainstorming workshop organised to provide the students a mind blowing experience by diving into the waters of this field . The cherry on the cake was the fact that after attending the workshop the participants could make their own robots and program them combined with the concepts of Arduino which deepened their understanding of both the concepts of robotics and arduino combined.

data.name: BOT FUTBOL
data.short:
What about a football match
between robots?We conducted
a game for robots in our main
event of CULMYCA'18.
data.description:
You might be a footballer but can your bot play football? MICROBIRD-THE TECHNO CLUB,
conducted an intresting event in which participants were challanged to make a programmable 
bot which could play football. Individual or team ,both type of participation was allowed.
Some rules were set and the winner was chosen by using  technology itself.These types of 
events always motivate young minds and we were able to do so.

data.name: Whack-em-all
data.short: Have you ever got an urge to step on things on your way? Still got a child inside you? Have you ever craved to play the frog hitting game that everyone had in their playing box? To complete this urge of the child inside everyone Microbird organised Whack-em-all.
data.description: During Culmyca 2019, Microbird brought the classic frog and hammer game in an all new avatar! So, to let the child inside everyone born again and hit it out coz it was Whackâ€™em All. An event which was opened for eveyone in which everyone came, played and the fastest mind won.

data.name: LOckdown Ideathon
data.short: This Ideathon was conducted to invite the ideas out of young minds and put them to use to solve real life problems!
data.description: This event was an event which aimed at providing platform to the growing ideas of the young and innovative minds.This was a contest in which participants were required to share their ideas about the solutions of the existing problems in the society.

data.name: Blaze-O-Rama
data.short: When love spoke the voice of heaven and stars set the dazzling night to emotions, time must have ceased to contemplate this glorious fusion of dance and romance. To set everything on fire Microbird presented BLAZE-O-RAMA
data.description: Who doesn't love the idea of Dance and Romance? And a fusion between them is just bomb. So, to let this Light of Love set the stage on fire with a pinch of drama adding even more flavours to it, BLAZE-O-RAMA: the penumbral light and dance show by MICROBIRD was organised during Culmyca 2019!

data.name: Kaleidoscope
data.short: Ponder upon being able to think of any word or pattern and showing it to the world on a big screen the very next moment! Sounded like a miraculous invention! To make this miracle possible Microbird organised Kaleidoscope.
data.description: In the grand event of Culmyca 2019, Microbird presented a contemporary way to showcase one's imagination through our much-awaited event KALEIDOSCOPE: The Modern Display,changing the world from proposition to presentation. Presenting penumbral screen with yet another modern twist!

data.name: MASTERMIND
data.short:
Do you think you are
technally strong? We conduct
-ed this event to test the same 
in our main events in 
CULMYCA 2018.
data.description:
Modern era is era of technology and everyone have some technical knowledge.But technical 
quizes always inspires students to gain more knowledge.With the same idea we conducted this 
event in which students were asked to make a team of four. It was conducted in three rounds 
in which technical questions were asked from different fields and they had to answer maximum
of them to win the game.

data.name: DEAD LIFT
data.short:
Making robots is fun and
make it programable to play 
games. is craziest thing.
That's what this event was
all about.
data.description:
This event was part of our main events in CULMYCA'18. The game was to make a robot and 
the bot had to collect blocks from a starting point and after crossing all the hurdles in the track 
they had to reach the finish line. Participants were allowed to take part in team of four. Robot
with minimum time and maximum numbers of block would win the race.

data.name: PLC and Programming
data.short: This webinar aimed at providing knowledge to the students about PLC Prohgramming which is proving to be extremely useful in today's world and is the base of many important innovations.
data.description: :This amazing webinar open for all branches provided an insight into the Starting of PLC Programming which was helpful for all the curious and techie brains.The session taught how to build PLC Control applications and Industrial projects with improved PLC based automation systems which was an extreamely useful knowledge to grab!

data.name: IoRT Workshop
data.short:
This was a two days 
wrokshop in which all
participants were given
basic information about
IOT and Robotics.
data.description:
A two days workshop was conducted where each topic of INTERNET of ROBOTICS
THINGS were taught with the help of a bot which was completely controllable from 
our mobile phone through an app. All the hardware used and working of app was 
explained. A quiz was also conducted and we provided IORT Tool Kits to winners.

data.name: PCB War
data.short: An event which basically enchance and challenged the PCB designing skills of the participants.
data.description:
A thrilling and amazing event conducted on 30 sep 2020.
This event basically targeted the young minds and pushed them to bring out their
 PCB designing skills alongwith an opportunity to grab amazing prizes!
E certificates were provided to all the participants to appreciate the enthusiasm in the competition.

data.name: Robo Rennen
data.short: Do the world of robotics interest you? Do you get fascinated by the sight of moving robots doing a task? To make the intrests on one reality Microbird hosted one of the most amazing event that was Robo Rennen.
data.description:
In Culmyca 2019, Microbird introduced everyone to the most thrilling event of the year- RoboRennen.
A robot which carried loads, collected and overcame all the hurdles, just like a superhero.
A team event with maximum 4 members in each team, who were given a problem stateent to make their own load lifter robot.

data.name: #<Geek> Like
data.short: Is tagging your friends in memes is your hobby?Do you find your meme game strong enough? That's why Microbird hosted this amazing activity which was open for everyone and was fun to be a part of it.
data.description: The club organised an online encounter of 7 days where tagging can take one towards prizes and mentions! Here we presented you with a big time blast of witty and informative online event HASHTAG GEEK.

data.name: PUBG Tournament
data.short: This event was for all the gamers out there ! to showcase their skills at PUBG and win exciting prizes just by gaming!
data.description: This gaming event was organised by the club to fill the boring days of the students with some thrill and excitement . The event saw a huge number of squads participating and winning amazing prizes by just showing their skills at one of the most famous game PUBG!

data.name: #tag Geek
data.short: Most interesting and fun event ever! the participants had to just mention their friends in the comment section in an attractive manner and the response on the comment was counted for the result!
data.description: Microbird - The techno club was back with this interesting event to present the participants with a big time blast of the witty and informative online event.The participants had just to mention their friends in the comment section with a unique style and the comment with the most number of reactions was declareda as the winner! This event was a true fun to participate in!

data.name: PRAGYAN 2021
data.short:
Pragyan is the electronics 
 project based competition 
conducted every year to test
student's practical knowledge
of electronics.
data.description:
It was a project based competition between young creative minds.Students were given a 14
dyas time to submit their projects.Students were allowed to take part in groups of three or
participate indiviually.  Conducting these type of activities is always fun and it brings a lot of
enthusiasm in students and this was our only motive. Winners were awarded with exciting 
prizes.

data.name: Robbo Soccer
data.short: Ever thought about playing soccer with your creation and no physical exertion. Did you ever thought of having an ability to fuse technology with sports? Microbird presentedRobbo Soccer and made this possible.
data.description:
Everyone likes to be challenged and exploring new fields. Therefore, under Culmyca 2019, Microbird challenged everyone to make their own bots to compete in the soccer world.
We presented ROBO-SOCCER: a blend of robotics and soccer that was bound to check out one's technical dexterity. Participats took part in a team of 4 and were givena problem statement to solve and make their bot with the answer derieved.

data.name: Techchef
data.short: A quiz as interesting as ever was organised by the club where the participants were thrown questions at about electrical and circuit designing event was also included to put the knowledge of students to practicality.
data.description: This was basically an online quiz and circuit designing event. Exciting prizes were awarded to the winners which increased the enthusiasm and talent showcasing will of the participants. The students were also made to simulate the project on Tinkercad to bridge the gap between theoretical and practical knowledge

data.name: IOT
data.short: An amazing workshop conducted by the club to make the students acquainted with the concept of Internet of things alongwith doubt solving sessions at the end!
data.description: - This was a two day long workshop on this emerging field of Internet of Things. This workshop was successfully conducted on Aug 15 and Aug 16 2020 and saw a huge number of curious and aspiring minds!The workshop taught the basics of the concept as well as the topic in detail to make sure that the participants are well versed with this internet controlled world and develop more ideas in the field!

data.name: Catch them all
data.short: It was hard to believe when a 90's kid said he didn't know what 'Pinball' was. So, it was the time when they set the ball rolling, crossing over all bumpers and ramps. And to make it possible Microbird came up with Catch Them all.
data.description: Admist Culmyca 2019, Microbird- The Techno club, brought a journey filled with nostalgia and amusement through one of its most awaited event Catch'em All-a twist of flippers that you had to catch to win! A team event in which a problem statement was provided to each team which they had to solve to win.

data.name: Workshop stimulated loop tracer
data.short: Who won't be excited to gain some practicality along with their btech degree? For the same Microbird organised the most awaited workshop in which everyone thought how to make a line follower robot.
data.description:
Microbird- the techno club, presented its most awaited once in a year WORKSHOP which was open for everyone. It was a DIY workshop where everyone will got hands on experience and technical knowledge along with fun.
The purpose of the workshop was to enlighten one's curious minds with the topic:
"Stimulated Loop Tracers and Decision Control"

data.name: CATCH THEM ALL
data.short:
It was an engaging event
of MICROBIRD in CULMYCA 
2018. Participants had to 
make bot and catch the
shining light balls with it.
data.description:
We all love playing with balls and light. Adding a little technology in it we conducteda game in 
CULMYVA'18 where particiants had to make manually operated robot and showered some
shining balls using light. Participants were allowed to make a team of four members and a
 particular set of rules were given and they were challanged to catch the maximum number of 
different balls using that bot.
